verses.roman:
gopī-gaṇa dekhi' kṛṣṇera ha-ila sādhvasa
lukāite nārila, bhaye hailā vibaśa

synonyms: gopī-gaṇa—all the gopīs combined together; dekhi'-seeing; kṛṣṇera—of Kṛṣṇa; ha-ila—there were; sādhvasa—some emotional feelings; lukāite—to hide; nārila—was unable; bhaye—out of fear; hailā—became; vibaśa—motionless.
translation: As soon as Kṛṣṇa saw all the gopīs, He was struck with emotion. Thus He could not hide Himself, and out of fear He became motionless.
